General.Name: Beijing Infosec Technologies Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Beijing Infosec Technologies Co.,Ltd. develops and provides application security products in China. Its products portfolio includes identity security products, such as certificate authentication system (NetCert), unified identity authentication management system (NetAuth), dynamic password system (NetPass), and security operation and maintenance gateway (NetFort); data security solutions comprises signature verification server (NetSign), trusted timestamp server (NetTSA), and electronic signature system (NetSeal); and communication security products, including application security gateway (NSAE), application delivery system (NetOpti), SSL VPN gateway (NetGate), safe internet gateway (NetSafe), and application security firewall (NetWAF). The company also provides mobile unified authentication security management platform (MAuth), mobile security middleware, mobile authentication app, and mobile token app; cloud security solutions, which include Cryptography application integration system (CCypher) and cloud management platform (ICMC); and platform security products, such as full password security service platform (CSSP). It serves finance, human resources, medical insurance, medical care, social security, taxation, education, customs, tobacco, transportation, and other industries. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Global Financial Information Center, Beijing, China, 100052
